metadata.title: Bronze
metadata.description: This is our level one sunbed. For a budget-friendly price, you will get 14 minutes maximum and separate facial lamps for a beautiful bronzed tan.

props.title: Bronze
props.description: This is our level one sunbed. For a budget-friendly price, you will get 14 minutes maximum and separate facial lamps for a beautiful bronzed tan.

props.title: Experience the Bronze Difference
props.content: Welcome to our Level One Sunbed at Ohana Sun Tanning, where you can achieve a stunning bronzed glow without breaking the bank. For just a budget-friendly price, indulge in up to 14 minutes of tanning bliss. Our sunbed features separate facial lamps that target your face for an even, radiant tan, enhancing your overall appearance. The ergonomic design ensures a comfortable tanning experience, while the advanced technology provides a consistent and effective tan every time. Whether you‚Äôre prepping for a special occasion or just looking to brighten your day, our Level One Sunbed is your perfect solution for a natural-looking tan. Join us at Ohana Sun Tanning and let your skin shine with confidence!

props.title: Benefits of Bronze

benefits.title: Affordable Tanning Option
benefits.description: Experience a beautiful bronzed tan at a budget-friendly price, making it accessible for everyone.

benefits.title: Quick Session Length
benefits.description: Enjoy a maximum of 14 minutes per session, perfect for those with a busy schedule looking for efficient tanning.

benefits.title: Facial Lamp Enhancement
benefits.description: Separate facial lamps provide targeted tanning for a radiant, even facial glow, enhancing your overall tan.

benefits.title: Beginner Friendly
benefits.description: Designed for those new to tanning, this service offers a gentle introduction to sunbed tanning with minimal commitment.

props.description: Discover the many advantages of choosing Bronze at Ohana Sun Tanning

props.title: What Clients Say About Bronze
props.description: Hear from satisfied clients who've experienced our Bronze.

testimonials.name: Taylor Camelot
testimonials.review: Got the perfect subtle spray tan from Gail for headshots. She listens to what you want and knows the product well. I look like a bronzed goddess!

testimonials.name: Sivan Alaev
testimonials.review:
Image Sun is the best Tanning Salon Experience!! I have had a great time in the local tanning salon since the first time I went there. I was referred by a good friend that I worked with, Tiffany P. The cool part about it is that the first time you come there you receive one free tan. I was interested in a spray tan, just to try it for the first time. Honestly it looked great on my friend, so I wanted it too.

When I walked into Image Sun, I was greeted with big smiles =] The interior decor is soothing at the salon too. I introduced myself, and then met Ariel and her mom Gail. Ariel gave me an introduction to everything her tanning salon offers. They were both very nice to me and very informative about what kind of tan I should get, since it was my first time, It made me feel comfortable. From that moment I knew I wanted to become a member at Image Sun and have a tan body. A tan body is a sexy body.

After having a spray tan, also getting a "double dip" which is..getting a spray tan and then the stand up bed. I looked at myself in the mirror and was happy about the results! I was bronze baby and it looked fabulous! I would recommend Image Sun to everybody that I know. The atmosphere there is welcoming and fun with music in the background. You can listen to all kinds of music while you tan and sing your little heart out!

Image Sun is an awesome place to get your tan on! They have convenient hours, open from 9 a.m. until 9 o'clock p.m. Mon-Thu. Friday 9-7 & Sat-Sun 10-6 p.m. When I first started coming to Image Sun, I wanted to come back everyday, so I did.

It is truly a wonderful experience every time I come.
Check them out!

Sincerely,
-Sivan Love-

testimonials.name: Nikki Callies
testimonials.review: Always have a great experience when I visit. Airbrush tan comes out great!! Recommend to anyone needed a nice bronze tan

faqs.answer: You can enjoy a maximum of 14 minutes per session on the Bronze sunbed to achieve a beautiful bronzed tan.
faqs.question: How long can I use the Bronze sunbed?

faqs.answer: Yes, the Bronze sunbed features separate facial lamps designed to enhance your tanning experience and help you achieve an even, radiant complexion.
faqs.question: Are there facial lamps in the Bronze service?

faqs.answer: Absolutely! The Bronze service is budget-friendly and perfect for beginners looking to explore indoor tanning without a significant commitment.
faqs.question: Is the Bronze service suitable for beginners?

faqs.answer: For best results, we recommend using the Bronze sunbed 2-3 times a week, allowing your skin to rest between sessions.
faqs.question: How often can I use the Bronze sunbed?

faqs.answer: You can wear a swimsuit or tanning lotion to protect areas of your skin, but many clients prefer to tan nude for an even result.
faqs.question: What should I wear during my tanning session?

faqs.answer: Yes, you must be at least 18 years old to use the Bronze sunbed. We require age verification to ensure compliance with health regulations.
faqs.question: Are there any age restrictions for using the Bronze service?

props.title: Frequently Asked Questions
props.description: Get answers to common questions about Bronze.

props.title: Ready To Book Bronze?
props.description: Schedule your bronze appointment today and experience the difference.

contactInfo.address: 3230 East Union Hills Drive, Suite 105, Phoenix, AZ, 85050
